text: News Bulletin of the International Defence & Aid Fund

focus
ON POLITICAL
REPRESSION IN
SOUTHERN AFRICA
This Index is divided into three parts: SOUTH AFRICA, NAMIBIA and RHODESIA/ZIMBABWE, and entries should be sought under the appropriate territory.
The numbers following each entry refer to the issue and the page no.; thus Chikane, Moses Maboleka 15/6, 16/13 refers to entries in FOCUS no. 15, p.6, and no. 16 p.13.
